```{r}
BiocManager::install("fgsea")
```
```{r}
install.packages("data.table")        # install it
library(data.table)
```
Type any R code in the chunk, for example:
```{r}
library(fgsea)
#library(data.table)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
data(examplePathways) # list of pathways
data(exampleRanks) # vector of gene ranks
set.seed(42)
fgseaRes <- fgsea(pathways = examplePathways,
                  stats    = exampleRanks,
                  minSize  = 15,
                  eps      = 0.0,
                  maxSize  = 500)

```
```{r}
rank_df <- read.csv('/data/08_21/ranked_mean.csv', )
ranks <- rank_df$rank_mean
names(ranks) <- rank_df$gene
ranks
```

```{r}
pathways <- scan("/data/test.gmt", what="", sep="\n")
pathways <- strsplit(pathways, "\t")
names(pathways) <- sapply(pathways, `[[`, 2)
pathways <- lapply(pathways, `[`, c(-1, -2))
pathways
```
